name: TV MUNITION Men's Shirt
description:
Over 85% of all media content is produced and owned by just 5 media companies! This fact allows them to control and sway the perspective on all information released to the public through TV stations, films, radio, newspapers, magazines, and internet. Be weary of where you get your information and don’t believe everything you’re told.

Sizes Available: S, M, L, & XL.

Colors Available: Black, Gray.

Please specify desired SIZE and COLOR after purchase.

Orders will ship 1-4 days after payment is received. We offer Free Exchanges if the size doesn't work out.

name: MICRO-XPLOSION Men's Shirt
description:
The expression and feeling of music comes alive through the notes and melodies; the message is conveyed through the lyrics. Expression should never be suppressed or controlled but should be encouraged freely. Plug yourself into creativity, and always express yourself! Loudly!

name: NINJA KILL Men's Shirt
description:
The recent Mexican drug wars are malicious, uncontrollable and have seen over 10,800 murders since 2007. In the 14th century, the Japanese designed a way to deal with such rebels – the Ninja. The secret society of the Ninja worked through illusion, espionage and assassination to keep the community in line. Maybe things related to a secret society aren’t such a bad thing after all.

Sizes Available: S, M, L, & XL.

Colors Available: Green, Dark Grey

Everyone knows that music can change the world, but who knew music could change someone’s look as well. Note: Don’t be intimidated by other hoodies – grab a cold beer and let your rock n roll side show!!

name: Zombie Nation Hoodie
description:
Influenced by the Sprainge design, this hoodie demonstrates the possibilities of an attack of the post-apocalyptic variety while merging the style of Jackson Pollock with screen printing. Don’t let this design (or its meaning) keep you up at night.
